name: @lincot/solana-chunk-loader
description: Helpers for the Chunk Loader Solana program

scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm   --sourcemap --minify --target browser --external:@coral-xyz/anchor,@solana/web3.js --outfile dist/index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format cjs   --sourcemap --minify --target node    --external:@coral-xyz/anchor,@solana/web3.js --outfile dist/index.js
scripts.build: bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:dts
